Source.Name: faba-icon-theme
Source.Description: Faba is a Linux desktop icon theme. It has designed with simplicity and compliance to standards in mind. Faba's purpose is to serve as a base icon theme to others (such as Moka). It comprises only of a system icons –folders, mimetypes, toolbar icons, etc.

Package.Name: faba-icon-theme
Package.Description: Faba is a Linux desktop icon theme. It has designed with simplicity and compliance to standards in mind. Faba's purpose is to serve as a base icon theme to others (such as Moka). It comprises only of a system icons –folders, mimetypes, toolbar icons, etc.
